title: Who believes in this? Was over 6% of the population actually involved in a drive like this?
selftext:
[https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nationwide-cleanliness-drive-on-october-1-saw-participation-of-8-75-crore-people-says-centre/articleshow/104138940.cms](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nationwide-cleanliness-drive-on-october-1-saw-participation-of-8-75-crore-people-says-centre/articleshow/104138940.cms)

How can I verify that this data is correct or incorrect?
comments:
Of course. How dare you not trust the propaganda ministry.

Every household has a routine of daily cleaning for atleast an hour. Some more. Floor, kitchen, dusting, washing…

Even if you assume an average household of 6 people, more than 8 crore people did “shrumdaan” of atleast 1 hour on 1st Oct. 

I hope I have been able to help you see the truth that was in front of your eyes.
